PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13162018-10-26ECCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS (MDMER) in order to (1) enable the storage of tailings in one water body frequented by fish that is part of the Young-Davidson mine expansion project; and (2) correct a discrepancy between the French and English description of item 41 of Schedule 2 of the MDMER.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0219 Publication Date: 2018-11-14
AttachmentsAttachment
